definition:
An *alternating series* is a series of the form

$$\sum_{i = 0}^{\infty}(-1)^ia_i$$

or

$$\sum_{i = 0}^{\infty}(-1)^{i+1}a_i$$

where $(a_n)$ is a non-negative sequence. Loosely, this is just a series
where the “alternate” between positive and negative.
